rows.label: tlk006301_04_msg0001
rows.name:
To get to the Sanctus Chain, you'll need
to leave town, head through Amphoret
Pillar and descend the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: tlk006301_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Once you're out of the drifts, you'll
also need to traverse the Great Pillar
Passage.

rows.label: tlk006301_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I realize that we are in no position to
ask anything of you. And yet...
